title: Challenger Ahri Splash Mod
body:
Just thought it would be fun to mess around with the splash
Edit: Added new picture where she has shorter bangs (the first pic/link)

replies.body:
Not Dauntless.
Doesn't matter.

On topic though. Hairfix is better. But maybe slightly shorter bangs. Having less hair tied up just fits her better.
Like this?

Perfect

Just need to rename it to Dauntless now and I'd buy it. 
Enough though I've sucked with Ahri hard for the last year despite her being the first champion I played and got good at.

I like the name Dauntless better, too. 

Dauntless: Fearless. Does not get intimidated
Challenger: One who competes in championship. A person who challenges. 

We can see which one is the clear winner here.
But we have championships though, and victorious skins. Challenger makes sense.
It makes more sense if you're thinking of it as a reward for getting to Challenger, but as something you purchase at the beginning of the season... not so much.

But if it weren't for challenger being the highest tier, challenger skins would make sense. You start off as a challenger, gain a better skin if you're victorious, and gain a championship skin when you're a champion. From a thematic angle.

I guess they thought of challenger since you are entering the fight as a new challenger (you're a new challenger entering the arena) in the new season and this skin IS for the start of the season. Plus, when we are a challenger (the opponent of the enemy team), we are seen as red/purple name/healthbar to them. But Dauntless just sounds cooler. All challengers are not winners and Dauntless is more imposing. I like the concept that I'm fearless going into battle (Dauntless) rather than that I'm just a challenger that comes in to fight (Challenger).

This this this this this. Plus one for sure.

I knew there was something about this skin that put me off, and you've identified it perfectly.
This thread actually surprised me, pretty cool to see some different interpretations and minor changes.

:D

now all that's left is to get the name changed back to dauntless, if you would be so kind.

Thank you =]
I just personally liked her with more hair - kind of like her other skins- where it frames her face. But the original artwork is very beautiful

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sweet,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YtvHUf7r,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-01-13T21:43:48.227+0000)
>
> This thread actually surprised me, pretty cool to see some different interpretations and minor changes.

It's probably too late for this, but is there ANY chance we could see these changes some time in the future, or anything like these?
This is really well done. Great job. The default splash was good but your edits are AWESOME.
Thank you

I like the 4th one best, it actually looks like hair now instead of an odd hat.

Also the name needs to be reverted back to Dauntless. Whoever thinks Challenger doesn't sound lame is clearly not fluent in English.

What I think about the original is that the longer head piece near the forehead to nose bridge is there to cover up the empty space that is her forehead, what I like though is the 3rd one peekingeyeahri.jpg because not only does it look nicer it has more taste to it and the hair covers up the empty forehead space!

I prefer peekingeyeahri.jpg over the original, too. I also like the hairfix.jpg =D

They drew the headpiece before they drew her eyes though, because her eyes are spaced a little too apart. You can see it in the picture I commented with to FantasyDreamer. I had to move her left eye closer. 

What I disliked most was her eyebrows. Though fierce, it didn't seem...."Ahri"-like to me. So although it is slightly unnoticeable, I lengthened and softened her eyebrows as well (smallheadpiece.jpg). But the bangs solved that problem much better =3

While I actually like the fierce look in her eyes because it brings out the feeling of the kitsune in her.  It shows that part of her blood, since after all she feeds on the essence of men to stabilize her human form.

I'm not 100% fond of the hairfix.jpg because if you think about it, her ult lets her dash around the map and well you wouldn't want your hair possibly clouding your vision.  Again I thoroughly enjoy the peekingeyeahri.jpg because it gives a feel of power still while not messing with her eyes and covering up the area of her forehead.

Oh I love her eyes! Just not her eyebrows...unless that's what you mean. 

For functionality, Ahri would definitely have a hard time with all that hair in her way. I was just trying to match her original splash more since she does have that hair in her face:

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SVAAVXUMURo/VDwpN4GPLvI/AAAAAAAAbJw/zq1fLshfmrU/s1600/Ahri_Splash_0.jpg
True true, but to me in this Splash Art for Challenger Ahri it doesn't feel right with all that hair in the way with the head dress too

Especially since it's a nice new look for her, right? Aesthetically wise, I just liked her with more hair since, usually when you take photos, you show off your "best", and I think of it like a photoshoot she took before she went off to battle and retied her hair XD. 

But I definitely get what you're saying since her hair tied back more definitely matches her theme. Looks more clean cut and fluid. I'm just biased for more hair.

Edit: That's why I gave different options for people with different opinions. I'm going to change the picture for the splash when it comes out =3
Awesome, I hope Riot really takes your thoughts here into consideration and maybe talk about the changes to her art since they've been doing so with the new upcoming classic splash change.
Hairfix is **so gorgeous** wth D:

omg! hairfix ahri so sexy. 
nb3gasm

I can't stand how the original helmet has that long spike running down Ahri's nose bridge.  It just looks so off putting.  Your changes make it looks so much nicer, not to mention probably more comfortable for Ahri's sake.  Fine work!

I'd say the third picture looks best to me, the fourth one just has a bit too much hair in front.

The last one gets all of my yes.

Also, I CAN FINALLY COMMENT...
I prefer the peeking eye one the most. don't care too much for the hairfix one.
hairfix is gorgeous oh my gosh
Good work man! I love how this hides her eyebrow expression, she looked so evil. Her hair line was also weird. This looks so cute! I like the bottom or last 2 (esp peekingeye) Needs more views ^-^

Another interesting thing is that they drew her eyes slightly more apart than normal. I noticed this when I made her headpiece smaller.

Edit: You can notice her left eye is positioned a little further away from her nose than her other eye.
I like the last one with her hair out :3
nice!
I love Ahri, hands down my favorite champion and this skin is amazing. I would buy this the day it released. No questions asked.

I like that Hairfix.jpg

That's how you Ahri, see that Riot?

Out of all the mods, I decided to change to this so I can see it looking through my skins and on the loading screen. 

http://i836.photobucket.com/albums/zz284/zombietranniesattack/ChallengerAhriskinscreen.jpg
last one seems best but covering one of the eyes might look better like the 3rd pic

I had no idea I accidentally posted this topic twice lol 
Thanks Riot for removing the other one! Must have happened when I was trying to post the discussion, but it kept telling me ERROR.
I like 3
Oh wow. The different splashes are awful in comparison to the original splash, which by the way makes her look badass. {{champion:103}}
Do you mean to say her very original splash is the best out of all her skins? Or are you saying my mods are not to your taste?

your probs right on both ideas, i mean the original makes her look legit. Shes soo pretty and yet so fierce and kawaii at the same time. Black skin tight leather Ahri mid rush coming at you with the power of the 9 tailed fox to blow just a kiss.  You can see all her power emanating from her orb to all around the spalsh. The short hair seemed soo good, reminds me of catwoman abit and she looks soo primal, very animilistic if that makes sense at all. Just  the other splashes take away from the concept of the skin. I should've said this, and not my original response.
You do know that your hair one is the reason for the helmet right?  It's to make sure her hair doesn't block her line of sight.......

Oh I know.  It's just a personal aesthetic preference for me. But that's why I made the other one where her hair isn't blocking at all and her helmet isn't spiking into her nose. That blocks her sight, too, when she tries to look sideways.

What I really like about the the hair fix is that I no longer mistake the ears for super saiyan hair -- because I thought they were hair and I was like "wait... I don't remember challenger Ahri having anime hair..."
Really well done! I think the splash looks much better with these edits, as I don't feel like the art is "off" anymore. My favorite is probably the shorter bangs splash.

Fur realzies though, I would love that last one. The Hairfix.jpg one.

Nice job man,

RIOT PLEASE
Love the last one.
